colour.models.rgb.dataset.cinema_gamut Module¶

Cinema Gamut Colourspace¶

Defines the Canon Cinema Gamut colourspace:

  • CINEMA_GAMUT_COLOURSPACE.

See also

RGB Colourspaces Jupyter Notebook

References

[1]Canon. (2014). EOS C500 Firmware Update. Retrieved August 27, 2016, from https://www.usa.canon.com/internet/portal/us/home/explore/product-showcases/cameras-and-lenses/cinema-eos-firmware/c500
colour.models.rgb.dataset.cinema_gamut.CINEMA_GAMUT_PRIMARIES = array([[ 0.74, 0.27], [ 0.17, 1.14], [ 0.08, -0.1 ]])¶

Cinema Gamut colourspace primaries.

CINEMA_GAMUT_PRIMARIES : ndarray, (3, 2)

colour.models.rgb.dataset.cinema_gamut.CINEMA_GAMUT_ILLUMINANT = 'D65'¶

Cinema Gamut colourspace whitepoint name as illuminant.

CINEMA_GAMUT_ILLUMINANT : unicode

colour.models.rgb.dataset.cinema_gamut.CINEMA_GAMUT_WHITEPOINT = array([ 0.3127, 0.329 ])¶

Cinema Gamut colourspace whitepoint.

CINEMA_GAMUT_WHITEPOINT : ndarray

colour.models.rgb.dataset.cinema_gamut.CINEMA_GAMUT_TO_XYZ_MATRIX = array([[ 0.71604965, 0.12968348, 0.1047228 ], [ 0.26126136, 0.86964215, -0.1309035 ], [-0.00967635, -0.23648164, 1.33521573]])¶

Cinema Gamut colourspace to CIE XYZ tristimulus values matrix.

CINEMA_GAMUT_TO_XYZ_MATRIX : array_like, (3, 3)

colour.models.rgb.dataset.cinema_gamut.XYZ_TO_CINEMA_GAMUT_MATRIX = array([[ 1.48981827, -0.2608959 , -0.14242652], [-0.45816657, 1.26162778, 0.15962363], [-0.07034967, 0.22155767, 0.7761816 ]])¶

CIE XYZ tristimulus values to Cinema Gamut colourspace matrix.

XYZ_TO_CINEMA_GAMUT_MATRIX : array_like, (3, 3)
